org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure

Class MathSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.infrastructure.MathSupport

  • public abstract class MathSupport
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides computational support for arithmetic calculations in OptorSim.

    Copyright (c) 2002 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

      • addGaussianJitter

        public static double addGaussianJitter(double mu,
                                       double sigma)
        This method gives a random jitter which is added to the mean bandwidths taken by BandwidthReader. A Gaussian distribution is used, with the mean value mu and standard deviation sigma passed from the calling routine.

      • addLandauJitter

        public static double addLandauJitter(double mu,
                                     double sigma)
        This method gives a random jitter which is added to the mean bandwidths taken by BandwidthReader. A reverse Landau distribution is used, with the mean value mu and standard deviation sigma passed from the calling routine.

      • nextReverseLandau

        public static double nextReverseLandau()
        This method generates a reverse Landau distribution with a most probable value of zero.
